Mysteries.Name: The Annunciation
Mysteries.Event: Mary learns that she has been chosen to be the mother of Jesus

Mysteries.Name: The Visitation
Mysteries.Event: Mary, pregnant with Jesus, visits her cousin Elizabeth

Mysteries.Name: The Nativity
Mysteries.Event: The birth of Jesus in Bethlehem
Mysteries.Lesson: Poverty, Detachment from the things of the world, Contempt of Riches, Love of the Poor

Mysteries.Name: The Presentation at the Temple
Mysteries.Event: Mary and Joseph take Jesus to the Temple to present him to God
Mysteries.Lesson: Gift of Wisdom and Purity of mind and body

Mysteries.Name: The Finding of Jesus at the Temple
Mysteries.Event: Jesus is found in the Temple discussing his faith with the teachers
Mysteries.Lesson: True Conversion (Piety, Joy of Finding Jesus)
